Classes

class  Track
 Fundamental data object of Audacity, placed in the TrackPanel. Classes derived form it include the WaveTrack, NoteTrack, LabelTrack and TimeTrack. More...

 DECLARE_EXPORTED_EVENT_TYPE (AUDACITY_DLL_API, EVT_TRACKLIST_RESIZED,-1)
 TrackList is a flat linked list of tracks supporting Add, Remove, Clear, and Contains, plus serialization of the list of tracks.

TrackList is a flat linked list of tracks supporting Add, Remove, Clear, and Contains, plus serialization of the list of tracks.
